title: How to Bake a Yellow Chiffon Cake

steps.headline: Add vegetable oil, unbeaten egg yolks, water and vanilla in a mixing bowl.
Combine the dry ingredients and then add to egg yolk mixture.
Beat until a smooth batter forms.
Beat egg whites with cream of tartar in a separate bowl.
steps.description: Once the egg whites are stiffly beaten, fold into the egg yolk batter.

steps.headline: Pour the cake batter into an ungreased baking pan.
steps.description: Bake 30 minutes or until the cake springs back when lightly touched.

steps.headline: Invert cake pan onto a wire baking rack to cool.

text: Preheat oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Add vegetable oil, unbeaten egg yolks, water and vanilla in a mixing bowl.  Mix the ingredients well.  Combine the dry ingredients and then add to egg yolk mixture.  Beat until a smooth batter forms.  Beat egg whites with cream of tartar in a separate bowl. Once the egg whites are stiffly beaten, fold into the egg yolk batter. Pour the cake batter into an ungreased baking pan. Bake 30 minutes or until the cake springs back when lightly touched. Invert cake pan onto a wire baking rack to cool.  Makes one 8" cake.
